EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Welcome to your access to the Halifax House Price Index, administered by Markit.
If you already have credentials to access the Halifax House Price Index through the secure FTP site (SFTP) or through the https://files-eu.markit.com URL, you may continue to use these credentials and there will be no disruption to your access.
If you have not previously registered to access the Halifax House Price Index and you do not have credentials you should use the login details provided below to set up your access. Please note that you may access this in one of two ways:
1. Via secure FTP site (SFTP). Your login details are: Host: files-eu.markit.com Port: 22 Username: HPI-CompanyName-First.Last NOTE: Please note you may need to speak to your IT to download and install a standard SFTP client programme.
2. Via a web browser. Your login details are: URL: https://files-eu.markit.com Username: HPI-CompanyName-First.Last NOTE: Your browser will need to support the latest Java version in order to use the Java enabled version of the site. Please uncheck this option on the login page if you face any issues and attempt to re-login.
Password: For security reasons this will be provided in a separate email. The same username and password can be used regardless of the method used to access the data.
If you have received this email in error or have any other questions, please contact us at: support@markit.com.
Kind regards,
IHS Markit Support
U.S.: + 1 877 762 7548 EMEA: + 800 6275 4800 Asia Pacific: + 65 6922 4210 Email: support@markit.com {!Case.Thread_Id}
